src:
Hasil Pertandingan Badak Lampung vs Arema FC: 4-3
01 Nov 2019, 17:43 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Badak Lampung sukses memenangkan laga sulit melawan Arema FC di lanjutan Shopee Liga 1 2019. Menjamu tim asal Jawa Timur tersebut, pasukan Milan Petrovic menang dengan skor sengit 4-3.
Gol kemenangan Badak Lampung dicetak oleh Hattrick Marquinhos dan Hariyanto Pano sementara Arema FC memperkecil kedudukan berkat gol Sunarto, penalti Makan Konate dan Hamka Hamzah.
Bermain dihadapan pendukung sendiri, Laskar Saburai mengawali laga dengan baik. Pertandingan baru berjalan 10 menit, Marquinhos berhasil membawa Badak Lampung unggul lebih dulu.
Memanfaatkan kesalahan Hamka Hamzah dalam melakukan sapuan, bola berhasil direbut Marquinhos. Dengan tenang, pemain asal Brasil itu mencetak gol dengan tendangan kaki kanan.
Tujuh menit berselang, giliran Hariyanto Panto yang mencatatkan namanya di papan skor. Hariyanto sukses menjaringkan si kulit bundar ke dalam gawang Tim Singo Edan dengan tendangan kaki kiri, setelah memanfaatkan bola rebound hasil tendangan Fernandinho
Tertinggal dua gol, Arema FC coba mengejar ketertinggalan. Akan tetapi, sampai babak pertama berakhir, skor 2-0 untuk keunggulan Badak Lampung tetap bertahan.

Si
mak jalannya pertandingan di babak kedua di bawah ini.
text:
Lampung Rhino vs Arema FC Match Results: 4-3
Nov 01 2019, 17:43 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Lampung rhino successfully won a difficult match against Arema FC in the continued Shopee Liga 1 2019. Entertaining the team from East Java, Milan Petrovic's troops won with a fierce score 4-3.
The Lampung Rhinos' winning goal was scored by Hattrick Marquinhos and Hariyanto Pano while Arema FC reduced their position thanks to Sunarto's goal, Makan Konate and Hamka Hamzah's penalty.
Playing in front of his own supporters, Laskar Saburai started the game well. The game has been running for 10 minutes, Marquinhos succeeded in bringing Lampung Rhinos to excel first.
Utilizing Hamka Hamzah's mistakes in sweeping, the ball was won by Marquinhos. Calmly, the Brazilian scored with a right foot.
Seven minutes later, it was Hariyanto Panto's turn to register his name on the scoreboard. Hariyanto successfully netted the round skin into the Singo Edan Team goal with a left foot kick, after utilizing the rebound ball Fernandinho kick results
Left behind two goals, Arema FC try to catch up. However, until the first half ended, the score 2-0 for Lampung Rhino advantage survived.

then the game in the second round below.
